title.en: An Aspirational Prayer to Behold the Beautiful Face of Khecharī

text.en: From the dance of bliss-emptiness of limitless conquerors,
text.en-trans: tayé gyalwé detong dögar ni

text.en: Appearing as so many visual illusions of saṃsāra-nirvāṇa;
text.en-trans: sizhi miktrul chiryang charwa lé

text.en: Henceforth, now, glorious Khecharī, Attractive One,
text.en-trans: dengdir khachö palmo yi ong ma

text.en: With my heartfelt recollection, protect with a joyful loving embrace.
text.en-trans: nying né dren no khyüpé tsé gé kyong

text.en: In Akaniṣṭha is the innate Mother of the conquerors,
text.en-trans: womin zhing na lhenkyé gyalyum ma

text.en: At the twenty-four places — the realm born ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: nyerzhi yul na zhingkyong daki ma

text.en: Pervasive wealth-holders — karmamudrās;
text.en-trans: nordzin khyabpé karma mu tra ma

text.en: Holy One, be the Refuge Lord of me the yogi.
text.en-trans: naljor dak gi kyab chok jetsünma

text.en: You are the manifestation of my own mind of emptiness,
text.en-trans: khyö ni semnyi tongpé rang tsal té

text.en: The actual VAṂ in the E space of the vajra city;
text.en-trans: dorjé drong na é ying bam gyi ngö

text.en: As a frightful rakṣasī of the island of illusion and
text.en-trans: gyumé ling na jikrung sinmo dang

text.en: A bright smiling youth — clearly revealed.
text.en-trans: dzum kar yowé langtso sarpa tön

text.en: I, not having found anything determined to be
text.en-trans: dak gi jitar tsal yang pakma khyö

text.en: Truly established, although searching, however much;
text.en-trans: denpar drubpé ngepa ma nyé né

text.en: The mind of that person wearied by elaborations,
text.en-trans: tröpé dubpé semnyi zhönnu dé

text.en: Takes rest in the forest shelter free of expression.
text.en-trans: jödral nak kyi khang bur ngalso ten

text.en: Ema! Now Ḍākinī, arise from space; from the Śrī Heruka,
text.en-trans: ema dani daki ying né zheng

text.en: King of Tantras, protect by the truth of the saying;
text.en-trans: heruka pal gyü kyi gyalpo lé

text.en: Accomplishment is through reciting the excellent
text.en-trans: dorjé tsünmo nyewé nyingpo chok

text.en: Near-essence mantra of the Vajra Queen.
text.en-trans: lakpé drub ché sungpé denpé kyong

text.en: In a secluded forest of Oḍḍiyāna,
text.en-trans: o di bishé wé té naktrö du

text.en: After protecting the lord of siddhas, Vajra Ghaṇṭapa;
text.en-trans: drubpé wangchuk dorjé drilbu ba

text.en: With the bliss of an embrace and kiss,
text.en-trans: khyü dang tsumbhé dewé jé kyang té

text.en: [You] led to the realm of Khechara; likewise also protect me.
text.en-trans: khajor chok gi rol zhing dak kyang kyong

text.en: From an island in the Ganga, the holy Kushali
text.en-trans: ganggé ling du jetsün kusali

text.en: Was actually led to the expanse of space,
text.en-trans: ngönsum namkhé ying su tripa dang

text.en: And after, glorious Nāropa was taken; likewise,
text.en-trans: palden na ro tapa jezung tar

text.en: Lead me also to Khechara, the city of Joyful Ones.
text.en-trans: dak kyang khachö gewé drong du tri

text.en: Through the compassion of the root and lineage [gurus] and the
text.en-trans: tsa gyü lama chok gi tukjé dang

text.en: Superior swift path of the profound, ultimate secret, great Tantra;
text.en-trans: gyü chen sang té nyurlam zab khyé dang

text.en: With the power of a pure unusual attitude, may I the yogi,
text.en-trans: naljor dak gi lhaksam depé tü

text.en: Quickly see the smiling face of the Joyful One, Khecharī.
text.en-trans: khachö ga mé dzum zhal nyur tong shok
